data.name: The brave loves the body of the devil
data.detailed_description:
If you like this game, please add it to your wishlist~

About this game:

All the materials in the game are genuine license

Plot summary:

Tucker is a brave who wants to be a hero,
By chance he drew a sword from a rock in the wild,
A white light flashed, and he was certified as a brave by the kingdom,
So he was sent out to fight against the Demon King. I didn’t expect the Demon King to be so beautiful.
Tucker suddenly doesn't want to be a hero! He has a new goal! Let the devil be his own woman!

Character introduction:

Octavir：

Charismatic devil, no one has seen her, very mysterious~

Eudora：

The devil’s capable man, beautiful and full of wisdom~

Bellin：

I like shiny accessories, because the cute personality is very popular~

Game features:

  • Go on an adventure with the protagonist and gain love on the way.
  • Easy to use turn-based combat with rich strategies.
  • Various professions and unique skills, each profession has powerful nirvana.
  • The monsters who avoid by walking, choose to fight relatively freely.

data.short_description: Tucker's goal is to become a heroic brave, and for this he embarked on a journey to defeat the devil, but after seeing the devil, he has a brand new goal-to make the devil his own woman!
data.supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Lion (OSX 10.7.X)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia or ATI graphics card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Not recommended for Intel GMA Graphics or Mac Minis or early-generation MacBooks

content_descriptors.notes:
- This Game may contain some sex implications not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work.
- The characters showed in the game are all over 18 years old.
